backend/main.mo: Implements access-controlled user profiles and messaging with conversations stored in maps and utilities for sorting and profile management.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence metadata linking deployment-related files, components, and tests for build validation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files including components, hooks, utilities, and deployment docs.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Runbook outlining prerequisites, checks, and steps for building and deploying the frontend to production.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for light and dark mode themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/live-smoke-checklist.md: Live environment smoke test checklist covering authentication, UI validation, profile setup, and messaging flows.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication state, profile gating, and rendering the chat layout.
frontend/src/components/CurrentUserHeade: Displays the current user's avatar or a fallback app icon in various sizes.
frontend/src/features/auth/AuthScreen.ts: Login landing page with branding, feature highlights, and Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/features/chat/ChatDetail.ts: Renders a chat conversation's messages with auto-scroll, sender highlighting, timestamps, and a message composer.
frontend/src/features/chat/ChatLayout.ts: Manages the main chat UI layout including sidebar, conversation selection, new chat flow, and logout handling.
frontend/src/features/chat/ChatList.tsx: Displays a scrollable list of conversations showing participants, last message, and relative timestamps.
frontend/src/features/chat/MessageCompos: Provides a text area and send button for composing and sending messages with auto-resizing input.
frontend/src/features/chat/NewChat.tsx: Allows starting a new chat by entering a Principal ID with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileSet: Modal dialog for setting up a user profile including name and optional avatar upload.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, conversations, messages, and mutations using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and theme variables and defines chat bubble component styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/utils/avatarImage.ts: Validates an image file and converts it to a data URL for avatar usage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-stored parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s current state, existing features, architectural notes, and versioning for a WhatsApp-like app. Lists implemented features, design requirements, and profile/avatar behavior rules.
